snippet: Dr. Lawrence B. Cohen, who performed an endoscopy on Joan Rivers before she went into cardiac arrest, is no longer acting as the medical director or doing procedures at Yorkville Endoscopy.
abstract: Dr Lawrence B Cohen, who performed an endoscopy on comedian Joan Rivers before she went into cardiac arrest, is no longer acting as medical director or doing procedures at Yorkville Endoscopy.

byline.contributor: Sheelagh McNeill and Susan Beachy contributed research.

lead_paragraph: Dr. Lawrence B. Cohen, who performed an endoscopy on Joan Rivers before she went into cardiac arrest, is no longer acting as the medical director or doing procedures at Yorkville Endoscopy.

headline.main: Doctor Who Worked on Joan Rivers Steps Down From Post at Medical Clinic
headline.print_headline: Doctor Who Worked on Rivers Steps Down From Post at Medical Clinic
